author: gouskos
body:
This PR removes the "ControlView" SiStrip DQM plots from the SiStrip/IsolatedBunches/ directory [i.e. no need to be there]. It keeps them under the SiStrip directory. [i.e. removes duplicated plots]
More details about the Control View plots in: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19204
title: remove Control view plots from the IsoBunches DQM dir
